entities.name: CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
entities.description: The Chief Executive Officer is the chief operating decision maker of the company, responsible for reviewing financial information, including segmented internal profit and loss statements.

entities.name: PRODUCTIVITY AND BUSINESS PROCESSES
entities.description: The Productivity and Business Processes segment consists of products and services in the company's portfolio of productivity, communication, and information services, spanning a variety of devices and platforms.

entities.name: INTELLIGENT CLOUD
entities.description: The Intelligent Cloud segment is part of the company's reportable segments, contributing to the financial performance based on cloud services.

entities.name: MORE PERSONAL COMPUTING
entities.description: The More Personal Computing segment is part of the company's reportable segments, contributing to the financial performance based on personal computing services.

entities.name: OFFICE COMMERCIAL
entities.description: Office Commercial comprises Office 365 subscriptions, the Office 365 portion of Microsoft 365 Commercial subscriptions, and Office licensed on-premises, including Office, Exchange, SharePoint, Microsoft Teams, Office 365 Security and Compliance, and Skype for Business.

entities.name: OFFICE CONSUMER
entities.description: Office Consumer includes Microsoft 365 Consumer subscriptions and Office licensed on-premises, and Office Consumer Services, including Skype, Outlook.com, and OneDrive.

entities.name: LINKEDIN
entities.description: LinkedIn includes Talent Solutions, Marketing Solutions, Premium Subscriptions, Sales Solutions, and Learning Solutions.

entities.name: DYNAMICS
entities.description: Dynamics business solutions include Dynamics 365, comprising a set of intelligent, cloud-based applications across ERP, CRM, Customer Insights, Power Apps, and Power Automate; and on-premises ERP and CRM applications.

relationships.relationship_description: The Chief Executive Officer reviews financial information related to the Productivity and Business Processes segment as part of the company's reportable segments.
The Chief Executive Officer reviews financial information related to the Intelligent Cloud segment as part of the company's reportable segments.
The Chief Executive Officer reviews financial information related to the More Personal Computing segment as part of the company's reportable segments.
Office Commercial is a primary component of the Productivity and Business Processes segment, contributing to the segment's offerings.
Office Consumer is a primary component of the Productivity and Business Processes segment, contributing to the segment's offerings.
LinkedIn is a primary component of the Productivity and Business Processes segment, contributing to the segment's offerings.
Dynamics is a primary component of the Productivity and Business Processes segment, contributing to the segment's offerings.
